仩字的基本解释

仩
cháng
“长”的俗字。

仩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shàng］
［《廣韻》時亮切，去漾，禪。］
亦作“丄1”。亦作“仩1”。
(1)位置在高处。
(2)指物体的上部。
(3)上位；社会的最高层。
(4)上天；天帝。
(5)君主；皇帝。
(6)泛指尊长。
(7)时间或次序在前。
(8)等第高或品质良好。
(9)犹正，主要意义。
(10)指事情向某方面发展所达到的程度。
(11)中国古代乐谱用来记写七音的七种记音符号之一。历代各地所用记音之字互有出入，常见者依次为“上、尺、工、凡、六、五、乙”七个字。
(12)用在名词后。表示在物体的表面。
(13)用在名词后。表示江河的边侧。
(14)用在名词后。表示一定的处所或范围。
(15)用在名词后。表示某种缘故。
(16)用在名词后。表示事物的某一个方面。
(17)丰足。
(18)起初。
(19)远；久远。
(20)广大。
(21)通“尚”。还得；尚且。
(22)通“尚”。崇尚；看重。
(23)通“尚”。匹配。多用于娶皇家女子为妻。

仩字的康熙字典解释
仩字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
仩字的起名意思

暂无。

Squat
Basic explanation of words
Squat
cháng
The vulgar word for "long".
Squat
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shàng］
["Guangyun" is bright and cut, go to yang, Zen. ]
Also known as "丄1". Also known as "仩1".
(1) The location is high.
(2) Refers to the upper part of the object.
(3) Upper position; the highest level of society.
(4) God; the emperor of heaven.
(5) Monarch; Emperor.
(6) Refers generally to the elder.
(7) Time or order first.
(8) High ranking or good quality.
(9) Still right, the main meaning.
(10) Refers to the degree to which things have developed in a certain direction.
(11) One of the seven syllables used in ancient Chinese musical scores to write seven syllables. The phonetic characters used in different places in the past dynasties are different from each other, and the common ones are "shang, chi, gong, fan, six, five, and yi" in order.
(12) Used after nouns. Represents on the surface of an object.
(13) Used after nouns. Represents the side of the river.
(14) Used after nouns. Indicates a certain location or range.
(15) Used after nouns. For some reason.
(16) Used after nouns. Indicates a certain aspect of things.
(17) Plenty.
(18) At first.
(19) Far; far away.
(20) The vastness.
(21) Through "Shang". Got; still.
(22) Through "Shang". Advocate; value.
(23) Through "Shang". match. Mostly used to marry a royal woman as a wife.
